mapper.select: select cb.*,count(cr.id) as reviewNum, count(cbl.id) as likeNumber ,cc.id as cusomerId, cc.nickname as userName from cc_blog cb left join cc_review cr on cb.id = cr.blog_id left join cc_blog_like cbl on cb.id = cbl.blog_id left join cc_customer cc on cb.user_id = cc.id left join cc_blog_type cbt on cb.id = cbt.blog_id ${ew.customSqlSegment} GROUP BY cb.id

select count(cb.id) as blogCount, ifnull(SUM(CASE WHEN YEARWEEK(DATE(cb.create_time), 1) = YEARWEEK(CURDATE(), 1) THEN 1 ELSE 0 END),0) AS weekCount, ifnull(SUM(CASE WHEN YEAR(cb.create_time) = YEAR(CURDATE()) AND MONTH(cb.create_time) = MONTH(CURDATE()) AND cc.id IS NOT NULL THEN 1 ELSE 0 END),0) AS monthCount from cc_blog cb left join cc_customer cc on cb.user_id = cc.id where cc.id = #{id}

select cb.*, count(cr.id) as reviewNum, count(cbl.id) as likeNumber, cc.id as cusomerId, cc.nickname as userName from cc_blog cb left join cc_review cr on cb.id = cr.blog_id left join cc_blog_like cbl on cb.id = cbl.blog_id left join cc_customer cc on cb.user_id = cc.id GROUP BY cb.id order by create_time desc limit 5

select cb.*, count(cr.id) as reviews, count(cbl.id) as likes, cc.id as customerId, cc.nickname as username from cc_blog cb left join cc_review cr on cb.id = cr.blog_id left join cc_blog_like cbl on cb.id = cbl.blog_id left join cc_customer cc on cb.user_id = cc.id where cb.id = #{blogId} GROUP BY cb.id

SELECT cb.id, cb.title, cb.simple_title, cb.picture, cb.content, cb.visit, cc.id as userId, cc.nickname, cb.create_time, cb.status, cb.update_time FROM cc_blog cb LEFT JOIN cc_blog_type cbt ON cb.id = cbt.blog_id LEFT JOIN cc_customer cc ON cc.id = cb.user_id ${ew.customSqlSegment} GROUP BY cb.id ORDER BY cb.create_time DESC
